name: Sherlock Holmeschool Hunt
description:
Welcome to a day in Sherlock's youth, at a time when he went to Holmeschool. On the day in question he was looking for his clever partner Watson. Can you help Sherlock find where he's hiding?

Controls: Arrow keys to move left and right, spacebar to jump, and "Z" to check an area for Watson.

I would keep volume up, as there's hardly any text displayed in the game, although there are voices. Oh, and don't let the scawy music get to ya. Sherlock's into those kind of beats.

"How did you find me so swiftly?"

"I'm in elementary, dear Watson."

Trijam entry by Zarki and BIG with the theme "Game based on a quote."
